name: Generate Box
author: Hesham Zebida

sections.description:
The plugin adds more functionality to the StudioPress Generate Child Theme.

This plugin is a very handy tool for Generate Child Theme users, it allows you to display the Generate Box on front page, home page, single posts, and everywhere. It also has an option to switch between different color schemes with only a few clicks.

See live example of Generate Box.

Credit

The Generate Box was designed by Rafal Tomal, lead designer of Copyblogger Media, and coded by Famous Bloggers.

=Resources=
You can download PSD here.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Note: You must have the StudioPress Genesis Framework and/or Generate child theme installed, or simply the plugin won’t work!
sections.faq:
What is Generate Box plugin?

Generate Box plugin is inpired by Generate Child Theme for Genesis, it adds more functionality to the Generate Box.

Is it going to work with my WordPress theme?

No. You must have the StudioPress Genesis Framework and/or Generate Child Theme installed, or simply the plugin won’t work!

What email service I can use?

Almost every email service that has HTML form.

I am having a problem getting it to work

Contact us via http://generatebox.com/
sections.changelog:
0.3

Fixed an issue with Premise plugin.
Removed the reset button from the plugin settings page.

0.2

The generate box is now responsive.

0.1

First release.
